senses.definition: 產生#能量 嘅物質，一般指#燃料、#太陽能、#水力、#電力、#食物 等等（量詞：種） (energy source; power; energy resources)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zoi3 sang1 nang4 jyun4
examples.translation: renewable energy

senses.definition: 由#陶 做成嘅工具 (earthen)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ngaa5 bou1
examples.translation: earthen pot

senses.definition: #瓦特 簡稱 (abbreviation of 瓦特, watt)
頭腦遲鈍嘅人；傻仔（帶有貶義） (fool; dork)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #牛 嘅肉，尤其指用嚟食嘅 （量詞：塊／嚿） (beef)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jau5 di1 jan4 deoi3 ngau4 juk6 gwo3 man5.
examples.translation: Some people are allergic to beef.

senses.definition: 成日（多數專登）做啲行為違背其他人（或者自己）嘅意願 ((as an intensifier) often taking (mostly deliberate) actions that someone (or the speaker himself) disagrees)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 我叫佢唔好去，但係佢硬係唔聽，而家就出事嚹。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 giu3 keoi5 m4 hou2 heoi3, daan6 hai6 keoi5 ngaang2 hai6 m4 teng1, ji4 gaa1 zau6 ceot1 si6 laa3.
examples.translation: I told him not to go, but he has never listened. Now he's in trouble.

senses.definition: 點睇都覺得爭咗啲嘢；差在 (the only flaw is that)

examples.text: 張兆輝又唔係唔靚仔，但硬係唔夠型，爭咁啲嘢咁。
examples.jyutping: zoeng1 siu6 fai1 jau6 m4 hai6 m4 leng3 zai2, daan6 ngaang2 hai6 m4 gau3 jing4, zaang1 gam2 di1 je5 gam2.
examples.translation: Cheung Siu Fai isn't ugly. He's just missing something that makes him look cool.

senses.definition:
一種硬糖；佢有一個膠製圓環，好似戒指噉，上面就係粒寶石型嘅糖；食嗰陣用手指戴住戒指啜，由於呢個食法好似BB食奶嘴咁，所以又叫奶嘴糖（量詞：隻）
yue:ring pop
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #女廁；通常只係用喺廁所外嘅標誌 (women's toilet; used in signage outside facilities designated for females)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #男廁；通常只係用喺廁所外嘅標誌 (men's toilet; used in signage outside facilities designated for males)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一個人或者群體身處嘅空間以外嘅地方；出面嘅世界 (the outside world; the external world)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢一個人住喺深山，同外界斷絕來往。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 jat1 go3 jan4 zyu6 hai2 sam1 saan1, tung4 ngoi6 gaai3 tyun5 zyut6 loi4 wong5.
examples.translation: He lived alone deep in the mountains, cutting off all communication with the outside world.

senses.definition: 外群 (social circle or group that falls outside some reference group; out-group; the outside)

examples.text: 的士司機嘅專業水平參差，咁多年嚟都不斷被外界詬病。
examples.jyutping: dik1 si2 si1 gei1 ge3 zyun1 jip6 seoi2 ping4 caam1 ci1, gam3 do1 nin4 lei4 dou1 bat1 dyun6 bei6 ngoi6 gaai3 gau3 beng6
examples.translation: Taxi drivers have varying levels of professionalism, which has made them targets of public criticism for many years.

用嚟提出下一步嘅問題或者建議 (so; then; used before raising a question or suggestion)
senses.label: 連詞

examples.jyutping: gam2 ngo5 dei6 haang4 laa1.
examples.translation: So let's go.

senses.definition: 喺天空兜圈噉飛 (to soar; to hover; to wheel high in the sky)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zek3 jing1 hai2 tin1 hung1 dou6 ngou6 coeng4.
examples.translation: The eagle is soaring in the sky.

senses.definition: 指#硬幣（好似#利是 入面嘅碎銀） (a dollar, a coin (e.g. coins in a red packet). Literally: solid things)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 以前封利是唔係個個有錢俾銀紙，有啲細路無家教一摸到利是入面係硬嘢就會扁咀。
examples.translation: In the past, not everyone could afford to put bank notes in red envelopes. Some ill-mannered children would show displeasure if they found only a coin in the red pocket.

senses.definition: 好#掯(kang3)嘅、好犀利嘅嘢（例如濃度好高嘅酒，好難應付嘅人） (strong, powerful, tough, difficult to handle or control (e.g. alcohol that is very strong, people who are hard to deal with))

examples.text: 嘩，呢條女係硬嘢嚟喎，你同佢合作要小心啲喇。
examples.translation: Wow, this girl is a tough one, you need to be careful to cooperate with her.

senses.definition: 被打；畀人打；多數唔會還手或者還唔到手 (to take a beating; to come under attack; to suffer from a beating; usually, without fighting back)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你下次再咁曳就一定要捱打。
examples.jyutping: nei5 haa6 ci3 zoi3 gam2 jai5 zau6 jat1 ding6 jiu3 ngaai4 daa2.
examples.translation: If you're naughty again next time, you will definitely receive corporal punishment.

senses.definition: 腦部血管由於過度疲勞、疾病、病變，引起腦部血液局部增多嘅#病症 ((med.) encephalemia; brain congestion)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 引伸比喻一個人極度憤怒嘅狀況 (a metaphor for a condution that someone's being extremely angry)

examples.jyutping: nei5 zan1 hai6 gik1 dou3 ngo5 nou5 cung1 hyut3!
examples.translation: You're really getting on my nerves! You almost made me see red!

senses.definition: 衣服打扮隨便，例如#牛仔褲 加T-shirt之類可以過頭#笠 嘅衫 (casual, informal or even shabby style of dress, wearing of jeans and undershirt or vest)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢一身牛記笠記去見寫字樓工。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 jat1 san1 ngau4 gei3 lap1 gei3 heoi3 gin3 se2 zi6 lau4 gung1.
examples.translation: He dressed casually for his job interview.

senses.definition: #同；#連；#一齊 (and; with; to join up; to be together)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: irrelevant; unrelated

senses.definition: #藝人 嘅諧音，對造作、#虛偽 嘅藝人嘅諷刺 (a homophone and pun of #藝人; used to call out hypocritical entertainers or artists; literally: fake person)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: Those hypocrites are putting on a show again.

senses.definition: 問句後面嘅疑問助詞，表示自己思考緊呢個問題 (particle used for questions when the speaker is wondering about or pondering the issue)
senses.label: 助詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 daap3 gan2 dei6 tit3 ding6 baa1 si2 ne1?
examples.translation: Are you taking the MTR or the bus?

senses.definition: 提問嘅時候，表示好有信心自己猜測得準確，有啲認叻嘅意味；會明顯拖長 (particle used in a question when one is confident of the accuracy of one's guess, with a touch of boastfulness; usually lengthened significantly)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 hai6 mai6 sik6 m4 gwaan3 sai1 caan1 ne1?
examples.translation: Maybe he's not used to Western food, huh?

senses.definition: 喺從句後面標示話題，後面嘅內容會圍繞住呢個話題 (end particle used to denote the topic; subsequent discussion will be about this topic)

examples.text: 即係呢，我唔係咁鍾意同佢坐埋一齊囉。
examples.jyutping: ze1 hai6 ne1, ngo5 m4 hai6 gam3 zung1 ji3 tung4 keoi5 co5 maai4 jat1 cai4 lo1.
examples.translation: What I mean to say is, I don't really like sitting with him.

senses.definition: 冇特定意思，純粹填充以換取時間 (used as a filler without a specific meaning; "well"; "like"; "so")

examples.text: 如果呢，我呢，即係呢，而家又覺得呢，唔係好想去，你唔會怪我㗎嗬？
examples.jyutping: jyu4 gwo2 ne1, ngo5 ne1, ze1 hai6 ne1, ji4 gaa1 jau6 gok3 dak1 ne1, m4 hai6 hou2 soeng2 heoi3, nei5 m4 wui5 gwaai3 ngo5 gaa3 ho2?
examples.translation: Hey, um... What if... er... what if I don't really want to go now, would you be mad at me?

senses.definition: 通常喺埋怨或者責怪嘅時候，拖長嚟講，用嚟#省略 後面想表達嘅負面諗法 ((when complaining or blaming someone) to replace a negative comment)

examples.jyutping: nei5 pou1 waa6 faat3 ne1......
examples.translation: Now, the way you put it...

senses.definition: 「#幾＋形容詞＋呢」嘅形式，表示唔耐煩 (used to express impatience, in the form "#幾 gei2 + adjective + 呢 ne1")

examples.jyutping: nei5 tai2 haa5 keoi5 gei2 leon6 zeon6 ne1!
examples.translation: Look at how clumsy he is!

senses.definition: 發音矩促，用於是非問句形式嘅反問，有怪責對方唔理自己提醒嘅意味 (uttered abruptly and used in a yes-no-form rhetoric question to blame the hearer of ignoring the speaker's reminder)

examples.text: 係咪衰呢？都話唔好爭咯，而家爛咗冇得玩啦！
examples.jyutping: hai6 mai6 seoi1 ne1? dou1 waa6 m4 hou2 zaang1 lok3, ji4 gaa1 laan6 zo2 mou5 dak1 waan2 laa1!
examples.translation: See? I told you not to fight over it. Now it's broken and you can't play anymore.

senses.definition: 眼垢；眼嘅油脂分泌物同埋塵、皮屑、眼淚等嘅混合體，呈淡黃色黏液狀，乾咗會結塊 (rheum; eye discharge; sleep in one's eyes)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: You have gunk in your eyes.

senses.definition: 形容因失敗、憤怒、驚訝而瞪大眼嘅樣 (with bulging eyes （e.g. because of anger）.)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢阿媽比佢激到眼凸凸。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 aa3 maa1 bei2 keoi5 gik1 dou3 ngaan5 dat6 dat6.
examples.translation: His mom was so mad at him that her eyes were coming out of their sockets.

senses.definition: 預測、預料有壞消息嘅時候用 (to be afraid that; used to politely forecast bad news)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 我諗怕你唔可以再嚟喇。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 nam2 paa3 nei5 m4 ho2 ji5 zoi3 lai4 laa3
examples.translation: I am afraid that you cannot come again.

senses.definition: 表示物件有幾#韌 嘅數值，每體積單位（#立方米）用幾多能量（#焦耳）整爛 (toughness)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 物件受到壓力時容易變形，唔易分開、碎開、斷裂成細塊特質；形容有類似特質嘅食物，咬唔碎 (tough; strong and durable (food or material))
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: ngan6 sing3
examples.translation: toughness

senses.definition: 指#股票 價格無乜升跌 (flat stock market)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: si5 fong3 ngau4 pei4 pin1 jyun5
examples.translation: The stock market is flat.

senses.definition: 實淨，唔易變形、屈曲，要較大力撳落下先會變形 (hard; tough; solid; firm; stiff)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: ngaang6 dou6
examples.translation: hardness

senses.definition: 物件受壓唔變形嘅程度 (hardness; stiffness; rigidity)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: Mohs scale of mineral hardness

senses.definition: #性別 之一，相對於 #男性 (female)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: neoi5 sing3 zyu2 ji3
examples.translation: feminism

senses.definition: 作女性典型打扮嘅男性（量詞：個） (cross-dresser; male who cross-dresses to disguise as a female)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢生日出偽娘打扮，講真又幾靚。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 saang1 jat6 ceot1 ngai6 noeng4 daa2 baan6, gong2 zan1 jau6 gei2 leng3.
examples.translation: On his birthday he cross-dressed like a lady. He was somehow attractive actually.

senses.definition: 好多嘢講，令人煩厭 (talkative to an annoying extent; prattling)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 hou2 ngam4 cam4, seng4 jat6 faan4 zyu6 saai3
examples.translation: He talks excessively and often bothers others.

senses.definition: 形容以渴望嘅眼神望實某個人或者某樣嘢 (staring lustfully at someone or something)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 個細路眼甘甘噉望實架雪糕車。
examples.jyutping: go3 sai3 lou6 ngaan5 gam1 gam1 gam2 mong6 sat6 gaa3 syut3 gou1 ce1.
examples.translation: The child stares at the ice cream van lustfully.

senses.definition: 一樣嘢（多數係建築物）長時間維持直立 (to stand firmly)
senses.label: 動詞

phonetic.original: ngat6 laap6 bat1 dou2:ngat6 lap6 bat1 dou2

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA

keywords: ngat6 laap6 bat1 dou2:ngat6 lap6 bat1 dou2

senses.definition: 冇乜#噪音，令人心情#平靜 (quiet; serene; tranquil; calm and peaceful)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: ning4 zing6 hung1 gaan1
examples.translation: a quiet space

senses.definition: 好快、好急咁去做一樣嘢；即刻盡快；唔拖；唔揼時間； (very quickly; at once)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 laa4 laa4 lam4 faan1 hok6 sin1 laa1.
examples.translation: You should pack up and rush to school.

senses.definition: 一種飲料；喺水度加檸檬片，令水帶帶檸檬嘅香同酸，再加入糖嚟調味（量詞：杯） (lemon water, a common beverage in Hong Kong; lemon slices are added to water to impart lemon fragrance and acidity into the water, and then sugar is added to taste)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 每次叫親凍檸水，阿媽都問點解唔叫檸茶，話檸茶抵飲啲。
examples.jyutping: mui5 ci3 giu3 can1 dung3 ning2 seoi2, aa3 maa1 dou1 man6 dim2 gaai2 m4 giu3 ning2 caa4, waa6 ning2 caa4 dai2 jam2 di1.
examples.translation: Whenever I order lemon iced water, my mum asks why I don't get lemon tea instead, saying it's more cost-effective.

senses.definition: 違背、唔遵從 (to violate; to be contrary to)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你唔好忤逆你阿媽嘅意思啦。
examples.jyutping: nei5 m4 hou2 ng5 jik6 nei5 aa3 maa1 ge3 ji3 si1 laa1.
examples.translation: Don't defy your mother's wishes.

senses.definition: #老細 諧音，暗指老細做蠢事 (a pun on #老細, insinuating stupid boss)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: nou5 sai3 jau6 hoi1 maai4 di1 mou4 wai6 wui2.
examples.translation: The boss calls another pointless meeting again.

senses.definition: 某人所養育嘅女性（量詞：個／粒） (daughter)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: sai3 neoi2
examples.translation: youngest daughter

senses.definition: #女朋友；交往緊嘅女性對象（量詞：條） (girlfriend)

examples.jyutping: nei5 jau5 mou5 neoi2?
examples.translation: Do you have a girlfriend?

senses.definition: （通常後生嘅）女性（量詞：條／班） (female (usually young))

examples.jyutping: hau6 saang1 neoi2
examples.translation: young girl

senses.definition: 外彎位 (outer side of a bend)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 ngoi6 dong3 jap6 waan1 sit6 zo2 wai2.
examples.translation: She suffers a distance disadvantage by turning at the outer side.

senses.definition: 表示不惜代價、#無論如何 (類似 #唔理 m4 lei2) (no matter what; even if)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 做得兄弟嘅，哪怕上刀山落油鑊，我一定撐你！
examples.jyutping: zou6 dak1 hing1 dai6 ge3, naa5 paa3 soeng5 dou1 saan1 lok6 jau4 wok6, ngo5 jat1 ding6 caang3 nei5!
examples.translation: We are bros, not matter how hard and tough the way ahead, I will standby your side !

senses.definition: 唔駛怕 (no need to fear for)

examples.text: 留得青山在，哪怕無柴燒
examples.jyutping: lau4 dak1 cing1 saan1 zoi6, naa5 paa3 mou5 caai4 siu1
examples.translation: As long as the green mountain exists, we will always have firewood. (Metaphor for treasure one's life and wait for a chance to make a comeback later.)

senses.definition: 餐廳、戲院、劇場等場所精美舒適嘅座位 ((of restaurants, theatres, etc.) comfortable seats for customers)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 樓上設有雅座，貴賓請移玉步。
examples.jyutping: lau4 soeng6 cit3 jau5 ngaa5 zo6, gwai3 ban1 cing2 ji4 juk6 bou6.
examples.translation: Comfortable seating is available upstairs. Please proceed.

senses.definition: 喺動詞前面，表示程度#強烈，又通常連續 ((before verbs) strong; super; great extent; high degree; usually continuous)
senses.label: 詞綴

examples.jyutping: nou6 fan3 sap6 sei3 go3 zung1
examples.translation: to keep sleeping for fourteen hours

senses.definition: 點心；將牛肉碎、馬蹄、葱，搓成肉丸，放喺腐竹上面蒸，食嘅時候再加喼汁。又叫做山竹牛肉球。（量詞：籠／碟／嚿／粒） (beef meatballs)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我唔食牛肉㗎，你做乜叫牛肉球呀？
examples.jyutping: ngo5 m4 sik6 ngau4 juk6 gaa3, nei5 zou6 mat1 giu3 ngau4 juk6 kau4 aa3?
examples.translation: I don't eat beef. Why did you order beef meatballs?

senses.definition: #農曆 年底 (end of the lunar year)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 年晚#煎堆 人有我有
examples.translation: before the Lunar New Year, everyone eats chewy pastry

senses.definition: 冇留意到啲好明顯嘅嘢 (to overlook something obvious; unable to see something right in front; literally: the eyes are too big and overlook)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 妖，眼大睇過龍做漏咗成頁考試卷。
examples.jyutping: jiu2, ngaan5 daai6 tai2 gwo3 lung4 zou6 lau6 zo2 seng4 jip6 haau2 si5 gyun2.
examples.translation: Crap, I somehow missed an entire page of the exam paper!

senses.definition: 唔敢做某件事；唔夠膽 (in fear; afraid)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你講完搞到我淆淆哋唔敢見佢添。
examples.jyutping: nei5 gong2 jyun4 gaau2 dou3 ngo5 ngaau4 ngaau2 dei2 m4 gam2 gin3 keoi5 tim1.
examples.translation: After our conversation, I'm a bit scared to see him.

senses.definition: 來自#南拳 口訣「練得硬橋硬馬、方能穩紮穩打」，形容一個人紮穩馬步，#橋手 堅硬，準備同人硬碰硬 (to be resolute and determined, using tough measures; to toughen up)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 你硬橋硬馬咁款，點同人講數呀。
examples.jyutping: nei5 ngaang6 kiu4 ngaang6 maa5 gam2 fun2, dim2 tung4 jan4 gong2 sou3 aa3.
examples.translation: With that fierce demeanor of yours, how can you expect to negotiate with others?

senses.definition: 形容一個人有真功夫 (to have real skills)

examples.text: 睇佢個款硬橋硬馬，你打佢唔過㗎喇。
examples.jyutping: tai2 keoi5 go3 fun2 ngaang6 kiu4 ngaang6 maa5, nei5 daa2 keoi5 m4 gwo3 gaa3 laa3.
examples.translation: Look at his powerful stance, you cannot win a fight against him.

senses.definition: 強調對方身為#女仔 嘅身份，通常用作提示對方嘅行為唔符合佢身份 (as a proper girl / young lady; used in advising on the correct behaviour appropriate for a young woman)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 女仔之家，你姿整啲啦好冇？
examples.jyutping: neoi2 zai2 zi1 gaa1, nei5 zi1 zing2 di1 laa1 hou2 mou2?
examples.translation: As a young lady, could you please pay more attention to your appearance?

senses.definition: 冇食嘢嘅時候會出現嘅感覺；覺得好想食嘢；覺得食欲得唔到滿足 (hungry; starving)

examples.translation: He is being so hesitant that he still has not decided what to eat after half an hour.

senses.definition: #蠢、#鈍、#傻 (stupid; braindead; retard)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.translation: stan

senses.definition: 貼住水邊嘅高地（量詞：個） (river bank; seashore)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: to go ashore; to be in a safe condition

senses.definition: 講大話，講啲假嘅嘢去令人有錯誤嘅理解 (to deceive; to persuade someone that something false is the truth, or to keep the truth hidden from someone for your own advantage; to lie)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 ngaak1 jan4! gan1 bun2 m4 hai6 gam2!
examples.translation: You are lying! It's not so!

senses.definition: 唔正確、#錯誤 嘅#理解 (misunderstanding; misconstruction; misconception)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: siu2 ceoi4 soeng1 fong1 ge3 ng6 gaai2
examples.translation: to dissipate misunderstandings existing between both sides

senses.definition: #理解#錯 人哋講嘅嘢、人哋嘅#本意 (to misunderstand; to misinterpret (someone's words or intention))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你誤解咗佢講嘅説話喇。
examples.jyutping: nei5 ng6 gaai2 zo2 keoi5 gong2 ge3 syut3 waa6 laa3.
examples.translation: You have misunderstood what he said.

senses.definition: 同#納粹主義、納粹黨有關 (Nazi-)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 1933-1945年間希特拉納喺德國實行嘅意識形態，包括反#猶太、種族主義、民族主義、平民主義、反#基督教、反#共產主義、反#自由#民主 (Nationalsozialismus; Nazism)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 重記得過去嘅人同事，昔日嘅情誼一直擺喺心裏面 (keeping old friendships and the old days in mind)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢個人好念舊，記得晒啲小學同學嘅名！
examples.jyutping: keoi5 go3 jan4 hou2 nim6 gau6, gei3 dak1 saai3 di1 siu2 hok6 tung4 hok6 ge3 meng2!
examples.translation: He is a person who keeps all the memories of old days and old friendships in his mind, he can remember all the names of his primary school classmates!

senses.definition: 睇耐咗都一樣咁靚，眼中嘅美係持久嘅 (with long-lasting beauty)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢個女演員幾襟睇，出道多年仲係咁靚。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 neoi5 jin2 jyun4 gei2 kam1 tai2, ceot1 dou6 do1 nin4 zung6 hai6 gam3 leng3.
examples.translation: That actress has a long-lasting beauty, she keeps shining through out all those years.

senses.definition: 利用唔同嘅技巧，製作出一啲符合美學，而且可以表達自己諗法嘅嘢；常見嘅類型有繪畫、雕刻、戲劇、音樂、文學等等。（量詞：門） (art; aesthetics; fine arts)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 八大藝術係指文學、繪畫、音樂、舞蹈、雕塑、建築、戲劇同埋電影。
examples.jyutping: baat3 daai6 ngai6 seot6 hai6 zi2 man4 hok6, kui2 waa2, jam1 ngok6, mou5 dou6, diu1 sou3, gin3 zuk1, hei3 kek6 tung4 maai4 din6 jing2.
examples.translation: The eight most important arts are literature, painting, music, dancing, sculpture, architecture, drama and movie.

senses.definition: #思考#方式 (way of thinking)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 gam2 nam2 faat3 hou2 m4 gin6 hong1.
examples.translation: That way of thinking is not healthy.

senses.definition: 諗出嚟嘅#意念（量詞：個） (idea; thought)

examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 nam2 faat3 gei2 jau5 san1 ji3.
examples.translation: This idea is quite creative!

senses.definition: 某人所養育嘅女性 (daughter)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 go3 neoi2 zung6 duk6 gan2 syu1 aa4?
examples.translation: Is your daughter still studying?

senses.definition: 收男女學生嘅學校（量詞：間） (co-educational school)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 有人話男女校嘅女仔會比女校嘅更率直。
examples.jyutping: jau5 jan4 waa6 naam4 neoi5 haau6 ge3 neoi5 zai2 wui6 bei2 neoi5 haau6 ge3 gang6 seot1 zik6.
examples.translation: Some say girls from co-educational schools are more straightforward than those from girls' schools.

senses.definition: 一場情節滑稽、非常誇張、好#胡鬧 嘅喜劇；多數引伸用嚟講一啲只係為咗引人注目，冇任何實際功用而又十分愚蠢嘅行為（量詞：場） (farce; figuratively, mockery)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢次選美不過係一個鬧劇，其實一早已經內定晒邊個攞獎。
examples.jyutping: ni1 ci3 syun2 mei5 bat1 gwo3 hai6 jat1 go3 naau6 kek6, kei4 sat6 jat1 zou2 ji5 ging1 noi6 ding6 saai3 bin1 go3 lo2 zoeng2.
examples.translation: This beauty contest was a mockery -- the winners were chosen long before the competition.

senses.definition: 用嚟重申自己係可以信賴，一定可以搞掂件事，令情況變好，類似「唔駛擔心，#萬大事有我」、叫人可以#放心、#鎮定 (used to reassure someone that one can be trusted with a task or that things will turn out alright, "don't worry, everything will be fine"; literally: be calm for me)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 聽日個會我搞得掂喎，我準備好晒㗎喇，你同我定啦。
examples.jyutping: ting1 jat6 go3 wui2 ngo5 gaau2 dak1 dim6 wo3, ngo5 zeon2 bei6 hou2 saai3 gaa3 laa3, nei5 tung4 ngo5 ding6 laa1.
examples.translation: I can handle the meeting tomorrow, as I've got well prepared already. Keep calm.

senses.definition: 傳統指#甜、#酸、#苦、#辣、#鹹 五種味覺，生物學上辣並非味覺，#鮮 味先係 (five basic tastes, traditionally including: sweet, sour, bitter, hot spicy, salty, note that spicy is not a basic taste biologically, it is umami instead)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 正月（農曆正月）嘅時候，用嚟表示日子嘅方法，例如年初三就係農曆正月第三日。 (added before the date of month to refer to dates in the first month of the lunar calendar (e.g. 年初三 nin4 co1 saam1 is the 3rd day of the first month))
senses.label: 詞綴

examples.jyutping: nin4 co1 gei2 aa3?
examples.translation: Which day of the first lunar month shall we meet?

senses.definition: 呃女性氹掂佢同自己進行#性行為；「呃#閪#屌」嘅諧音 (to deceive a female in order to have sexual intercourse with her; a near homophone of "呃#閪#屌" (ngaak1 hai1 diu2); literally: to deceive prawn crackers)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我仲以為你真心鍾意人，原來你只係想呃蝦條！
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zung6 ji5 wai4 nei5 zan1 sam1 zung1 ji3 jan4, jyun4 loi4 nei5 zi2 hai6 soeng2 aak1 haa1 tiu2!
examples.translation: I thought you really loved her, but it turns out that you only wanted to screw her pussy!

senses.definition: 一個人嘅內在特質，包括性格品德、內涵、文化修養等等 (inner beauty; spiritual beauty)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢係一個有內在美嘅女人。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hai6 jat1 go3 jau5 noi6 zoi6 mei5 ge3 neoi5 jan2.
examples.translation: She is a woman with inner beauty.

senses.definition: 唔孝順父母、不孝 (unfilial; disrespectful to one's parents)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢性格忤逆，成日都激到佢阿媽紮紮跳。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 sing3 gaak3 ng5 jik6, sing4 jat6 dou1 gik1 dou3 keoi5 aa3 maa1 zaat3 zaat3 tiu3.
examples.translation: She is very unfilial and always antagonizes her mum.

senses.definition: 形容一個人身體孱弱，體型瘦削 (extremely skinny and frail; a bag of bones; literally: thin and phantom-like)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢細個冇飯食，營養不良，搞到而家廿幾歲人都仲係奀挑鬼命。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 sai3 go3 mou5 faan6 sik6, jing4 joeng5 bat1 loeng4, gaau2 dou3 ji4 gaa1 jaa6 gei2 seoi3 jan4 dou1 zung6 hai6 ngan1 tiu1 gwai2 meng6.
examples.translation: He had little to eat and was malnourished during childhood, and consequently is still a bag of bones well in his twenties.

examples.text: 佢今次真係眼高手低，預計個營業額咁高，結果做得一半都唔夠。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gam1 ci3 zan1 hai6 ngaan5 gou1 sau2 dai1, jyu6 gai3 go3 jing4 jip6 ngaak2 gam3 gou1, git3 gwo2 zou6 dak1 jat1 bun3 dou1 m4 gau3.
examples.translation: He aimed high but accomplished little, his sales forecast was too optimistic, in the end not even half of the target was met.

senses.definition: 志向遠大但才能不足以完成；志大才疏 (with great ambition but little talent)

examples.text: 佢份人就係咁眼高手低，成日搶住做領導，但又無能力帶領班人做出好成績。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 fan6 jan4 zau6 hai6 gam3 ngaan5 gou1 sau2 dai1, seng4 jat6 coeng2 zyu6 zou6 ling5 dou6, daan6 jau6 mou5 nang4 lik6 daai3 ling5 baan1 jan4 zou6 ceot1 hou2 sing4 zik1.
examples.translation: He has great ambition but little talent. While eager to take the leading role, he is unable to lead the team to greatness.

senses.definition: 中國古代嘅貨幣，用銀整成，好似個元寶咁嘅形狀，以重量單位#両 計算幣值 ((silver) tael, an ancient Chinese currency)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #錢 嘅俗稱 (colloquial address of money)

examples.jyutping: mou5 daai3 ngan4 loeng2 ceot1 gaai1 tim1.
examples.translation: I forget to bring money.

senses.definition: 高傲自大，覺得自己高人一等嘅作風、感覺 (arrogance; haughtiness)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 即係#牛，通常用作合稱 (cattle, often as a collective address)

senses.definition: 困難嘅地方 (point of difficulty)

senses.definition: 本身指好#嬲，將「嬲」疊字，再加上「#豬」表示#親暱，引申至因為少少事就好易發嬲，帶貶義 (literally: angry pig. It originally means "to be very angry." However, the meaning is further extended, and it means to get mad with trivial matters easily.)

senses.definition: #膩 (overly sweet or greasy)

examples.jyutping: ni1 zung2 beng2 sik6 loeng5 faai3 zau6 nau6 hau4 laa3.
examples.translation: These cookies are so sweet that I don't want to eat any more after having just two.

examples.translation: I cut the withered leaves.

senses.definition: #面燶；#黑面 (with an angry/irritated face)

examples.jyutping: caau2 nung1 gu2 piu3
examples.translation: to lose money through speculation

senses.definition: 形容食物畀到人過份飽肚嘅感覺，但又未必真係令人食飽；又指因食太多肥膩、甜野而發膩 ((of food) too fatty or greasy; too sweet or filling)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: m4 zung1 ji3 sik6 daan6 gou1, taai3 nau6 laa3.

examples.jyutping: nei5 zou6 je5 mai5 gam3 nau6 laa1.
examples.translation: Stop dragging your feet and get your work done.

senses.definition: 一個物理系統對其他嘅物理系統做#功 嘅能力，常見嘅形式有熱能、電能、聲能、光能等 ((physics) energy)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: nang4 loeng6 sau2 hang4 ding6 leot6
examples.translation: law of conservation of energy

senses.definition: #力量（量詞：#股） (power)

senses.definition: #冬至 前後係咁落雨 (to rain continuously around the winter solstice)

examples.jyutping: lok6 gam3 do1 jyu5, gam1 nin2 jau6 ngau3 dung1 laa3.

senses.definition: 帶住#怒氣 噉鬧其他人 (to rubuke; to indignantly denounce)

examples.text: 佢累到公司冇咗一萬蚊，老細狠狠噉鬧佢一大餐。

examples.translation: The company lost $10000 due to his mistake. The boss shouted at him for quite a while.

senses.definition: 形容感受好複雜 (with mixed feelings; literally: five tastes mixed)

examples.text: 呢段往事令佢五味紛陳。
examples.jyutping: ni1 dyun6 wong5 si6 ling6 keoi5 ng5 mei6 fan1 can4.
examples.translation: The past event brought him mixed feelings.

senses.definition: 好難解決嘅問題（量詞：個／條） (difficulty; tough issue; challenge)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢個係數學界嘅世紀難題，好多數學家用咗成世時間都解決唔到。
examples.jyutping: nei1 go3 hai6 sou3 hok6 gaai3 ge3 sai3 gei2 naan4 tai4, hou2 do1 sou3 hok6 gaa1 jung6 zo2 seng4 sai3 si4 gaan3 dou1 gaai2 kyut3 m4 dou2.
examples.translation: This is a century-old problem in mathematics, which many mathematicians spent their whole lives on it but still could not solve it.

senses.definition: #耽誤 事情 (to cause delay or failure in work or business; to hold things up; to ruin a plan through mismanagement, negligence, etc.; to spoil something)

examples.text: 俾佢做呢份工作就只會誤事。
examples.jyutping: bei2 keoi5 zou6 ni1 fan6 gung1 zok3 zau6 zi2 wui2 ng6 si6.

senses.definition: 星級係國際間經常用嚟幫酒店、餐廳評級嘅機制，五星級代表最高級。 (five-star; figuratively, top)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢度裝修咁豪華、啲嘢又好食，真係五星級嘅享受啊！
examples.jyutping: ni1 dou6 zong1 sau1 gam3 hou4 waa4, di1 je5 jau6 hou2 sik6, zan1 hai6 ng5 sing1 kap1 ge3 hoeng2 sau6 aa3!

senses.definition: 表面、表皮 (surface; skin)

examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 wu2 ngoi6 pei4 dou1 m4 co3.
examples.translation: [ChatGPT]The exterior of this pot is not bad.

senses.definition: 通常講完自己或某啲人嘅資訊或者打算之後，用嚟詢問對方同樣嘅資訊，或者係咪會跟隨自己／所提及嘅人做同一樣嘢。 (And you? How about you?)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: #裏面 同埋#外面 (inside and outside)

senses.definition: 重新諗清楚啲，深入啲；#諗#深#一#層 (upon further reflection; literally: to think one level further)

senses.definition: 睡眼惺忪嘅樣 (bleary-eyed; drowsy)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢眼矇矇好似未瞓醒咁。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 ngaan5 mung1 mung1 hou2 ci5 mei6 fan3 seng2 gam2.
examples.translation: He looks sleepy with bleary eyes.

senses.definition: 咪埋眼 (describes someone who squints)

examples.jyutping: dim2 gaai2 sing4 jat6 ngaan5 mung4 mung4 gaa3?
examples.translation: Why do you always squint?

senses.definition: 對某啲事或人嘅睇法 (point of view)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢係我眼中係一個好友善嘅人。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hai6 ngo5 ngaan5 zung1 hai6 jat1 go3 hou2 jau5 sin6 ge3 jan4.

senses.definition: 一啲好難贏但係會盡全力打嘅比賽（量詞：場） (a tough battle)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: daa2 jat1 coeng4 ngaang6 zoeng3
examples.translation: to fight a tough battle

senses.definition: #硬碟 (hard disk; see #硬碟 ngaang6dip2)

examples.text: 佢個人好麻煩，你做錯少少嘢就會俾佢咬住唔放

senses.definition: #忌廉；一種以牛奶面頭嘅脂肪製成嘅奶製品，呈白色，淡味，質地鬆軟（量詞：噼／嚿） (cream)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: naai5 jau4 daan6 gou1
examples.translation: cream cake

senses.definition: #煉奶 加#牛油 嘅簡稱，喺茶餐廳或小食舖常用 (condensed milk and butter)

examples.jyutping: naai5 jau4 do1
examples.translation: toast spread with condensed milk and butter

senses.definition: 用強大嘅力量對付強大嘅力量 (head-to-head)

senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 當事人之外或者某個團體、圈子以外嘅人 (the external world; outside circles)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 外間有好多不利嘅傳聞。
examples.jyutping: ngoi6 gaan1 jau5 hou2 do1 bat1 lei6 ge3 cyun4 man4.
examples.translation: Scandalous rumours have been circulating in outside circles.

senses.definition: #視覺 系統嘅主要部分，係#頭 入面嘅小型球體，入面有晶狀體、視網膜等嘅部份，可以將影像聚焦再轉化做神經信號，經過視神經傳到#腦 處理（量詞：粒） (eyeball)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 未成年嘅男性（量詞：個） (boy)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 naam4 zai2 hou2 ho2 oi3.
examples.translation: This boy is adorable.

senses.definition: 為咗慳錢，食平價嘅麪包嚟做正餐 (to eat cheap bread, instead of full meals, in order to save money; literally 'to put up with bread')
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 為咗買名牌手袋餐餐捱麪包，值得咩？
examples.jyutping: wai6 zo2 maai5 ming4 paai4 sau2 doi2 caan1 caan1 ngaai4 min6 baau1, zik6 dak1 me1?
examples.translation: Is it really worth it to save money on meals and eat cheap bread every day just to buy a luxury handbag?

senses.definition: 用麪粉、砂糖、腐乳同其他材料整成嘅零食 (a sweet-and-salty fried pastry snack; sometimes translated as "ox-ear biscuit")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 事前冇#計劃 過，亦都唔係#特登 去做，只係咁啱就發生咗 (accidentally; by chance)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 部車死火唔係偶然，都好耐冇大檢過。
examples.jyutping: bou6 ce1 sei2 fo2 m4 hai6 ngau5 jin4, dou1 hou2 noi6 mou5 daai6 gim2 gwo3.
examples.translation: This car did not just breakdown by chance; it's been a long time since its last major inspection.

senses.definition: 第一人稱代詞，即係#自己 (I; me; my; the first person singular pronoun)
senses.label: 代詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 hou2 hoi1 sam1.
examples.translation: I am very happy.

senses.definition: 用於#紀年 嘅名號；一般由皇帝發起；發端自中國漢武帝，後來亞洲多國都受中國嘅影響，開始使用，目前仲用緊嘅國家就只有依然保持#君主制 嘅日本 (era name)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 國家名；位於西非；首都係阿布札 (Nigeria)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 地區名；位於#中國 北部嘅省級行政區，全名係內蒙古自治區，同#蒙古 接壤；首府係#呼和浩特 (Inner Mongolia; Nei Mongol)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 動物名；水陸兩棲嘅爬蟲類動物，腳比較短，有尾同鱗片（量詞：條／群） (crocodile; crocodilians in general (alligators, etc.))
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #彩虹 嘅一種，不過由於光線折射及反射情況唔同，所以顏色由外層到內層嘅分佈次序相反 (rainbow; variegated colours)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 特指#霓虹燈 (neon light)

examples.jyutping: ngai4 hung4 ziu1 paai4
examples.translation: neon sign

senses.definition: 一種大形鳥類，未馴化嘅野生#鵝，廣泛分報於北半球，多數係白色、灰色，係一種#候鳥（量詞：隻／群） (wild goose; often noted for their migratory nature)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
#神經 系統病嘅一種，俗稱「#老人痴呆」、「失智症」；患者會慢慢咁失去#記憶 同其他#認知 功能 (dementia or typically Alzheimer's disease)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我阿爺阿嫲冇腦退化呀，仲好精靈。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 aa3 je4 aa3 maa4 mou5 nou5 teoi3 faa3 aa3, zung6 hou2 zing1 ling1.
examples.translation: My grandparents don't have Alzheimer's. They're still very smart.

senses.definition: 人造淚水，有時會加入#抗生素、#類固醇 等嘅藥性用嚟治療、檢查（量詞：滴／支） (eye drop; medication for the eyes)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我隻眼好乾呀，你有冇眼藥水呀？
examples.jyutping: ngo5 zek3 ngaan5 hou2 gon1 aa3, nei5 jau5 mou5 ngaan5 joek6 seoi2 aa3?
examples.translation: My eyes are very dry, do you have any eye drops?

senses.definition: 隱藏真實姓名做一啲嘢 (anonymous)
senses.label: 區別詞

examples.jyutping: nik1 ming4 seon3
examples.translation: anonymous letter

senses.definition: 交税 (to pay taxes)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: naap6 seoi3 jan4
examples.translation: tax payer

senses.definition: 將啲嘢或人接入嚟 (to accept; to bring into)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: kap1 naap6 gang1 do1 san1 gu3 haak3
examples.translation: to attract more new customers

senses.definition: 畀錢 (to pay)

examples.jyutping: naap6 seoi3
examples.translation: to pay taxes

senses.definition: 有一部份下陷咗，水平低過附近嘅平面 (concave; hollow; sunken)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: zau2 nap1
examples.translation: dimple

senses.definition: 物件表面向內陷入 (dented)
睇到一啲情況；通常後接一啲唔好嘅情況，跟住係自己對呢個情況嘅感覺或者對應 (seeing that; usually followed by unfavourable situations)
senses.label: 連詞

examples.text: 眼見天就快光，但我份功課仲未做好。
examples.jyutping: ngaan5 gin3 tin1 zau6 faai3 gwong1, daan6 ngo5 fan6 gung1 fo3 zung6 mei6 zou6 hou2.
examples.translation: Seeing that dawn is coming, but my work is not fully done yet.

senses.definition: #泥 同 #沙 咁上下嘅物質 （量詞：拃／執） (mud and sand; earth)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: waan2 nai4 saa1
examples.translation: playing with sand

senses.definition: 好難避免，點都有機會發生 (being difficult to avoid; unavoidably; inescapable)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: san1 jan4 naan4 min5 jau5 co3.
examples.translation: Mistakes are unavoidable for newcomers.

senses.definition: #年紀 細，範圍大致係二、三十歲 (young; youthful; roughly between 20-30 years old)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: nin4 hing1 jan4
examples.translation: youth; teenager

senses.definition: 姓 (a surname, usually transliterated as "Nip")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 鏟泥，後來引申指粗重嘅工作 (mud shovel; later it came to refer to strenuous work in general)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 唔同種類#貨幣 嘅#兑換 (foreign exchange; forex)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ngoi6 wui6 gaau1 jik6
examples.translation: foreign exchange trading

senses.definition: 喺水度加切片嘅#檸檬，令水帶檸檬嘅香同酸（量詞：杯） (lemon water)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 聽人講每日飲檸檬水會皮膚靚啲。
examples.jyutping: teng1 jan4 gong2 mui5 jat6 jam2 ning4 mung1 seoi2 wui5 pei4 fu1 leng3 di1
examples.translation: I heard drinking lemon water can brighten our skin.

senses.definition: #性別 嘅一種，相對於 #女性 (male)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 由種子啱啱生長出嚟嘅植物 (young shoot; sprout; bud)
senses.label: 語素

examples.translation: to sprout

senses.definition: 拎住韞住咗#雀仔 嘅#雀籠 行街 (to carry a bird in a birdcage)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 第二人稱單數代詞；用嚟稱呼喺自己面前嘅對象，或者溝通嘅對象 (you; the second-person singular pronoun)
senses.label: 代詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 heoi3 bin1 aa3?
examples.translation: Where are you going?

senses.definition: 有時用嚟指唔特定嘅一個人 (sometimes used to refer to an unspecified person; also called the 'generic you')

examples.text: 見到人着衫核突，你唔會大大聲笑𠺢嘛。
examples.jyutping: gin3 dou2 jan4 zoek3 saam1 wat6 dat6, nei5 m4 wui5 daai6 daai6 seng1 siu3 gaa1 maa3.
examples.translation: If you saw someone dressed real badly, you wouldn't laugh out loud, would you?

senses.definition: 用糯米糰包住餡料整成嘅甜品（量詞：粒） (glutinous rice dumplings; loh mai chi)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: mong1 gwo2 no6 mai5 ci4
examples.translation: mango glutinous rice dumplings

senses.definition: #荔枝 嘅一種，特點係厚肉濃甜同埋細核（量詞：粒） ("chicken tongue" lychees, with smaller, partially developed seeds)

examples.jyutping: no6 mai5 ci4 tung1 soeng4 gwai3 gwo3 gwai3 mei2.
examples.translation: Chicken tongues" are usually more expensive than Kwai Mei.

senses.definition: 一種包裝，係一個球體嘅硬殼，可以喺中間剝開做兩邊，入面裝住小型嘅玩具，多數會有一系列唔同嘅款式。入錢落#扭蛋機 之後，用手去扭開個掣，就會隨機跌個扭蛋出嚟 (Gashapon; capsule toys)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #王國 嘅女性#君主（量詞：位／個） (queen regnant, a female monarch)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 俾人用錢請佢幫手打掃同做#家頭細務 嘅女性（量詞：個） (maid)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 喺ACG次文化裏面，一種有某種特定圍裙服飾嘅可愛女性角色 (in the ACG subculture, female wearing a particular style of maid outfit)

examples.translation: maid cafe

senses.definition: 對見到嘅某人或者某事，例如行為或者景況，覺得好討厭同埋反感，令自己難以接受 ((of a person, act or scene) causing someone to feel revolted, disgusted, or hard to look at; literally: "eyesore")
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 我見到你個衰樣就眼冤！
examples.jyutping: ngo5 gin3 dou2 nei5 go3 seoi1 joeng2 zau6 ngaan5 jyun1!
examples.translation: I feel disgusted just by looking at your ugly face!

senses.definition: 雙方都願意；唔係夾硬、逼出嚟，而係大家都願意噉做 (voluntary for both parties; consensual)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 呢啲嘢你情我願㗎啫，如果唔係都唔會發生。
examples.jyutping: ni1 di1 je5 nei5 cing4 ngo5 jyun6 gaa3 ze1, jyu4 gwo2 m4 hai6 dou1 m4 wui5 faat3 sang1.
examples.translation: It's based on mutual consent. Otherwise it won't happen.

senses.definition: 假扮成敵方陣營嘅同伴，暗中調查搜證嘅#特工（量詞：名／個） (planted agent; undercover agent)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 今次可以破到案，全靠兩位卧底同我哋裏應外合。
examples.jyutping: gam1 ci3 ho2 ji5 po3 dou2 on3, cyun4 kaau3 loeng5 wai2 ngo6 dai2 tung4 ngo5 dei6 leoi5 jing3 ngoi6 hap6.
examples.translation: Thanks to the two undercover agents helping us by transmitting information, we solved the case.

senses.definition: 好細心咁用眼睛留意同埋觀察身邊嘅事物 (sharp-eyed)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 好彩佢夠眼利，留意到啲細微嘅線索，終於破到案！
examples.jyutping: hou2 coi2 keoi5 gau3 ngaan5 lei6, lau4 ji3 dou2 di1 sai3 mei4 ge3 sin3 sok3, zung1 jyu1 po3 dou2 on3!
examples.translation: Luckily, he was so sharp-eyed that he spotted the hidden clues. Finally, we solved the case!

senses.definition: 向南方進發 (to head south)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 牛嘅肌肉韌帶（量詞：條） (beef tendon)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 當#爆呔 時臨時補救嘅一種工具 (temporary tyre repair seals)
身體嘅液體#排泄物，由#腎 小球過濾為原尿，然後再經腎小管處理成尿，再經輸尿管、#膀胱 及#尿道 排出，通常呈淺黃色（量詞：篤／灘） (urine)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你啲尿咁多泡，去睇下醫生啦！
examples.jyutping: nei5 di1 niu6 gam3 do1 pou5, heoi3 tai2 haa5 ji1 sang1 laa1!
examples.translation: Your urine is so foamy. See a doctor!

senses.definition: 覺得非常麻煩或者失望 (to feel very annoyed or disappointed; literally: even one's eyes pop out)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 班細路倒到成地都係漿糊，睇到我眼都凸埋。
examples.jyutping: baan1 sai3 lou6 dou2 dou3 seng4 dei6 dou1 hai6 zoeng1 wu4, tai2 dou3 ngo5 ngaan5 dou1 dat6 maai4.
examples.translation: The kids spilled glue all over the floor. As I watched them do so, I felt very annoyed and disappointed.

senses.definition: 國家名；位於#南亞 內陸喜瑪拉雅山脈，北面係#中國，而東、南、西都係#印度，首都係加德滿都。國境內有全世界最高嘅山#珠穆朗瑪峰。 (Nepal)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 全世界最高嘅山大部份都喺尼泊爾。
examples.jyutping: cyun4 sai3 gaai3 zeoi3 gou1 ge3 saan1 daai6 bou6 fan6 dou1 hai2 nei4 pok3 ji5.
examples.translation: Most of the highest mountains in the world are located in Nepal.

senses.definition: 底衫；或指有保暖功能嘅內衣（量詞：件） (underwear; or thermal underwear)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 夏天仲着內膽？你唔熱㗎咩？
examples.jyutping: haa6 tin1 zung6 zoek3 noi6 daam2? nei5 m4 jit6 gaa3 me1?
examples.translation: Why still wearing thermal underwear in summer? Don't you feel hot?

senses.definition: 襯墊、裏 (liner)

examples.text: 呢件褸用羽絨做內膽，又暖又輕身。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gin6 lau1 jung6 jyu5 jung2 zou6 noi6 daam2, jau6 nyun5 jau6 heng1 san1.
examples.translation: This jacket has down as liner, it is warm and light weight

senses.definition: 內部容器 (internal chamber)

examples.text: 呢個暖水壺用真空玻璃內膽，好保温㗎。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 nyun5 seoi2 wu2 jung6 zan1 hung1 bo1 lei1 noi6 daam2, hou2 bou2 wan1 gaa3.
examples.translation: This thermal flask use vacuum glass inner chamber, really good at keeping warm.

senses.definition: #老公 嘅阿#媽（量詞：個） (husband's mother; mother-in-law)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢好怕結婚之後同奶奶相處得唔好。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hou2 paa3 git3 fan1 zi1 hau6 tung4 naai4 naai2 soeng1 cyu5 dak1 m4 hou2.
examples.translation: She is scared that after getting married, (she) cannot get along with her mother-in-law.

senses.definition: 女僕人、工人對女主人嘅稱呼（量詞：個） (lady; madam)

examples.text: 奶奶，今晚要煮啲乜嘢餸啊？
examples.jyutping: naai4 naai2, gam1 maan1 jiu3 zyu2 di1 mat1 je5 sung3 aa3?
examples.translation: Ma'am, what dishes do I need to make for dinner tonight?

senses.definition: 祖母；阿爸嘅阿媽 (grandmother; father's mother)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我嫲嫲係一個好慈祥嘅人。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 maa4 maa4 hai6 jat1 go3 hou2 ci4 coeng4 ge3 jan4.
examples.translation: My grandmother is a kind person.

senses.definition: 對年老女人較親切嘅稱呼 (a friendly way to address an old woman; granny)
姓 (a surname, usually transliterated as "Ngou")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 姓 (a surname, usually transliterated as "Ngok")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 姓 (a surname, usually transliterated as "Ng")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 姓 (a surname, usually transliterated as "Ngau")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 姓 (a surname, usually transliterated as "Ngai")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 姓 (a surname, usually transliterated as "Ngan")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 姓 (a surname, usually transliterated as "Nin")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #時間 單位，等於#地球 圍住#太陽 公轉一圈嘅時間，大約係365.24地球#日；而#西曆 入面一年有365（#平年）或者366日（#閏年） (year)
senses.label: 量詞

examples.text: 我希望今年可以高多三厘米。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 hei1 mong6 gam1 nin2 ho2 ji5 gou1 do1 saam1 lei4 mai5.
examples.translation: I want to be 3 cm taller this year.

senses.definition: 姓 (a surname, usually transliterated as "Ngai")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 喺夜總會、夜店等娛樂場所裏面提供#陪客 服務嘅男人；佢哋有啲除咗陪客之外亦會提供性服務（量詞：個） (a male nightclub host, a male "PR" offering guests services ranging from companionship to sex.)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢以前喺夜總會做男公關嗰陣成日都要飲酒。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 ji5 cin4 hai2 je6 zung2 wui2 zou6 naam4 gung1 gwaan1 go2 zan6 sing4 jat6 dou1 jiu3 jam2 zau2.
examples.translation: When he was a host in a nightclub, he always had to drink (alcohol).

senses.definition: 即係#眼見 ；用眼睛去睇 (to watch with one's eyes)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ngaan5 hon3 sau2 mat6 dung6
examples.translation: to watch with one's eyes but not to touch with one's hands

senses.definition: #考慮 (to consider)

examples.text: 我眼見我啲組員唔做嘢，於是話咗俾教授知。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 ngaan5 gin3 ngo5 di1 zou2 jyun4 m4 zou6 je5, jyu1 si6 waa6 zo2 bei2 gaau3 sau6 zi1.
examples.translation: Considering my fellow group members were not doing anything, I told my professor about them.

senses.definition: 姓 (a surname, usually transliterated as "Ngai")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 男人嘅家姐或細妹嘅仔女（量詞：個） (nephew or niece;)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ngoi6 sang1 do1 ci5 kau3
examples.translation: A man and his nephew are often very similar.

senses.definition: 雙手或者多隻手指夾住一嚿嘢，向佢施加壓力 (to sqeeze; to pinch; to twist with one's fingers; to apply pressure with one's hands)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 nin2 baau3 zo2 go3 bo1.
examples.translation: He squeezed the balloon with his hands and burst it.

senses.definition: #扼 某人條頸 ((see also #扼 aak1) (of one's throat or neck) to strangle)

examples.text: 玩嗰陣唔好捻住人哋條頸啊！好危險㗎。
examples.jyutping: waan2 go2 zan6 m4 hou2 nin2 zyu6 jan4 dei6 tiu4 geng2 aa3! hou2 ngai4 him2 gaa3.
examples.translation: When you're playing, don't strangle the neck, it's really dangerous.

senses.definition: 有能力去做一啲嘢 (to be able to; can; could)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: nang4 m4 nang4 gau3
examples.translation: used to question the capability of a subject

senses.definition: 物件、建築物嘅外部；當你身處一個環境入面，喺門口以外包圍住呢個環境嘅空間就叫做外面。 (outside; exterior)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 出去外面玩啦，唔好阻住我做嘢！
examples.jyutping: ceot1 heoi3 ngoi6 min6 waan2 laa1, m4 hou2 zo2 zyu6 ngo5 zou6 je5!
examples.translation: Go play outside and don't interrupt my work!

senses.definition: 自己身處區域（如國家）之外嘅地方。 (a place other than where one lives and works)

examples.text: 年輕人應該去外面廣闊視野。

examples.translation: Young people should visit other places to broaden their horizons.

senses.definition: 五個#感官：#眼、#耳、#鼻、#口、#皮膚 (five sense organs)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 面相上，#面 上嘅五個部份：#眼、#耳、#鼻、#口、#眉 ((physiognomy) five parts on the face (including one's eyes, ears, nose, mouth and brows); facial features)
有五個#櫃桶 嘅#櫃（量詞：個） (cupboard with 5 drawers)

senses.definition: 色彩豐富 (colourful and multifarious; literally: five lights and ten colours)

senses.definition: #中華人民共和國 國旗，紅色底色，左上角有五粒黃色五芒星（量詞：面、支） (Five-Starred Red Flag: the national flag of the People's Republic of China)

senses.definition: 5 (five)

senses.definition: 地區名；位於#廣東，先後由縣、市變成#佛山 市轄區；同鄰近嘅#順德 同#番禺 合稱#南番順 (Nanhai; Namhoi)
色誘人哋嘅配偶 (to seduce; to tempt; to lure)

senses.definition: 一種膊頭嘅炎症，學名叫「黏連性肩關節滑囊炎」，患者會膊頭痛同遞唔高隻手 (frozen shoulder; adhesive capsulitis)

examples.translation: My aunt suffered from frozen shoulder a while ago. She couldn't even comb her hair.

senses.definition: （一個地方被以為）充滿#鬼、#幽靈 (to be haunted)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: go2 go3 dei6 fong1 naau6 gwai2 gaa3! m4 hou2 jap6 heoi3 aa3!
examples.translation: That place is haunted! Don't go in!

senses.definition: 泛指冇預謀之下意外殺人 (in common usage, to kill somebody accidentally)

senses.definition: 法律用語，係普通法 "manslaughter" 嘅中文翻譯，指冇謀殺咁嚴重嘅殺人罪 (manslaughter, a common law crime that involves the killing of another person but less serious than intentional murder)
#褲頭 好寬嘅中式褲，通常用褲帶紮實腰 (Chinese trousers with oversized waist, usually wear with waistband)

senses.definition: 指冇收入來源，靠食存糧過日子；穀種係農夫保留嚟種植新稻嘅#種子，非到#山窮水盡 都唔會攞嚟食 (to have to live on only one's savings, without any income)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢自從失業就日日留響屋企食穀種。
examples.translation: He started to live off his savings at home after unemployment.

senses.definition:
用嚟表示表情嘅字符組合 (emoticon

examples.jyutping: ni1 gei2 zou2 ngaan4 man4 zi6 dou1 hou2 dak1 ji3.

senses.definition: 顏色；淺綠色；啱啱生出嚟嘅葉嘅顏色；有清新嘅感覺 (delicate and light green)

senses.definition: 城市名；位於#中國 東南部，係#江西 省嘅省會，有滕王閣、百花洲等名勝古蹟 (Nanchang)

examples.jyutping: naam4 coeng1 jau6 giu3 zou6 jing1 hung4 sing4.

senses.definition: 香港地方名；位於#九龍#深水埗 西面，即係同名屋邨、車站以及富昌邨一帶，以前係碼頭用地 (Nam Cheong, Sham Shui Po)
#錯，有時係唔小心所致 (wrong; mistaken)

senses.definition: 城市名；位於#德國 東南部，曾經喺度進行過戰犯嘅大審判 (Nuremberg)

senses.definition: 現時多數專指「草肚(毛肚)」，即係牛嘅第一胃瘤胃(草胃)用來暫存同發酵，表面好似一層絨毛咁，口感軟滑。 (usually this term is now used to represent the grass/feather tripe only, which is made from cow's rumen. Literally: cow stomach)

examples.text: 老細我要碗牛肚麪唔該！

senses.definition: 舊時會用作四種用牛胃造食材嘅合稱。牛有四個胃，瘤胃(草胃)造成食材叫「草肚(或毛肚)」；網胃叫「#金錢肚」；重瓣胃叫「#牛百葉」；皺胃(真胃)就叫「牛沙瓜(牛傘肚)」。 (previously used as collective name of 4 types of beef ingredients made from cow's stomach. The "grass/feather tripe" is made from rumen; "gold coin tripe" made from reticulum(honeycomb); "bible tripe" made from omasaum; "umbrella triple" is made from abomasum.)
五穀類食物，意大利式麪嘅一種，通常好細粒，中間空心，呈S型，亦即係螺旋形嘅#通心粉 (cavatappi; cellentani)

senses.definition: #太陽系 所處嘅#星系 嘅名 (Milky Way Galaxy)

senses.definition: 一個人或者一樣嘢就咁望落個#樣 (appearance; exterior; looks)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #女子#足球 嘅縮寫 (women's soccer)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 裝調味料嘅餐具 (a utensil to hold seasonings)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 生物鹼，常見於茄科草木，植物儲喺葉度用嚟防蟲，對哺乳類動物而言係興奮劑，啲人之所以有煙癮，就係因為呢種化學物質 (nicotine)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 事物#流失 至外界 (to flow out; to drain away)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: brain drain

senses.definition: 強硬咁做嘢，無得寬容或者走棧 (rigidly; sternly)
senses.label: 副詞

senses.definition: 身體外部受嘅傷，而唔係內臟或者骨胳受傷 (external injury or wound; bruising)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 好彩只係皮外傷，內臟冇傷到。
examples.translation: Luckily it is just an injury to the skin, the internal organs are not hurt.

senses.definition: 家族入面，可以幫手、繼承家業嘅男人（量詞：個） (male member of a family clan who can help with and inherit family properties)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 傳統上男丁先至可以分到家產。
examples.translation: According to the tradition, only male members of a family clan can get a share of family properties.

senses.definition: 一個人造空間之中，一早就附設住一啲器材或者設施 (to have something pre-installed)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: There is a tv pre-installed in this car.

senses.definition: 指一個女人有外遇；同伴侶以外嘅男性發展性關係 (for a woman to cheat; to be sexually unfaithful (by hooking up with another male) to her husband or partner; literally, to hook a guy)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢因為老婆勾佬所以離咗婚。
examples.translation: He divorced because his (ex-)wife cheated.

senses.definition: 不為外人所知嘅情節 (inside story; circumstances not known to the outsider)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ni1 gin6 on3 jat1 ding6 jau5 noi6 cing4.
examples.translation: There must be an inside story of this case.

senses.definition: 同#外家 (maternal family)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 物件受外力，有一節向另一個方向變形 ((physically) to distort; to twist)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 欄杆經碰撞後嚴重扭曲。
examples.jyutping: laan4 gon1 ging1 pung3 zong6 hau6 jim4 zung6 nau2 kuk1.
examples.translation: The railings were seriosly distorted after the crash.

senses.definition: 將件事嘅情節描述到唔符合本來嘅情況；#歪曲 ((of descriptions of events) to distort)

examples.jyutping: nau2 kuk1 si6 sat6
examples.translation: to distort the facts

senses.definition: #扮 成一啲自己本來唔係嘅嘢 (to imitate; to pretend to be)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 有些騙徒會偽裝成銀行職員。
examples.jyutping: 有啲騙徒會扮銀行職員。
examples.translation: Some tricksters would pretend to be a staff of the bank.

senses.definition: 散佈喺空氣之中，通常形容#煙霧 ((in air) to be filled with; to spread all over; usually regarding smoke)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: jin1 mou6 nei4 maan6
examples.translation: to be filled with smoke

senses.definition: 用#車 或者其他類似嘅機械#轆 過去，通常會#壓 扁埋嗰樣嘢 (to crush; to roll over)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 溝咗好多水嘅#泥，介乎於固體同液體之間，#杰撻撻 咁 (mud)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一樣嘢睇落去個#樣 (appearance; outward feature)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #視力；用對#眼 嚟睇嘢嘅能力 (eyesight; vision)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 老人家眼力通常比較差。
examples.translation: The elderly usually have poorer eyesight.

senses.definition: 引申為觀察細微細眼嘢嘅能力 (used figuratively to refer to the ability to discern details)

examples.text: 「呢版第十二行打錯咗隻字喎。」「嘩，咁好眼力嘅你！」
examples.translation: There's a typo on line 12 of this page." "Whoa, you have a keen eye!

senses.definition: 一樣嘢出面嘅部份 (outside; external; exterior; surface)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一種因病毒感染引致嘅急性腦部炎症，症狀包括發燒、頭痛、嘔、攰、爛訓、意識混亂、怕光。 (medical term, encephalitis; cerebritis)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 同#耕種 有關 (agriculture; farming)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: nung4 jip6
examples.translation: agriculture; agricultural industry

senses.definition: 唔係身體外部接觸到嘅地方流血；即係身體入面嘅器官出血，或者血管出血 (internal bleeding)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 同一陣線或同一個組織嘅人之間有矛盾 (to conflict internally)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 希望我哋啲組員唔會內訌。
examples.translation: It is hoped that our group members would not conflict internally.

senses.definition: 鹹水魚 (rabbit fish)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 每#年 發行一次嘅#報告（量詞：份） (annual report)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 用嚟帶出一件啱啱明白原因、有所頓悟，因而覺得唔出奇嘅事 (no wonder; one can hardly blame; it's understandable that)
senses.label: 連詞

examples.text: 你咁勤力，難怪你咁成功。
examples.translation: You are so hardworking, no wonder you've achieved great success.

senses.definition: 貼身穿著嘅褲子（量詞:條） (underwear; undervest)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 量詞「#粒」加名詞「#鐘」，表示以#鐘頭 作為計算單位 (hour)
senses.label: 量詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 fan3 zo2 gei2 nap1 zung1.
examples.translation: She slept for several hours.

senses.definition: #卦 嘅基本組成單位。爻分陰陽，陽爻符號係「⚊」，陰爻符號係「⚋」。#八卦 有三個爻，六十四卦有六個爻。 (basic component of I Ching trigrams)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 好#吽逗 ((of a person) very dull)
senses.label: 形容詞

senses.definition: 形容人冇精神 ((of people) dull; lacking energy; unspirited)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你噚日做乜吽下吽下咁嘅？
examples.jyutping: nei5 cam4 jat6 zou6 mat1 ngau6 haa5 ngau6 haa5 gam2 ge2?
examples.translation: Why were you so dull yesterday?

senses.definition: 某行業裏面嘅人；熟悉某個領域嘅人；專業人士；專家 (professional; an expert at; adept in)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢好內行，佢嘅決定多數啱。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hou2 noi6 hong4, keoi5 ge3 kyut3 ding6 do1 sou3 ngaam1.
examples.translation: He is very professional, his decision is almost always correct.

senses.definition: #新郎 嘅屋企人 ((of wedding) family of the bridegroom)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: naam4 gaa1 m4 soeng2 baai2 zau2.
examples.translation: The family of the bridegroom does not want to have the wedding banquet.

senses.definition: #價錢#高昂；高價；要畀多啲錢先買到 (expensive; valuable)
senses.label: 形容詞

phonetic.original: ngaan5 zung1 deng1 juk6 zung1 ci3
jyutping: ngaan5 zung1 deng1 juk6 zung1 ci3

senses.definition: 比喻極度憎惡而亟想除去嘅事物。 ((lit.) pin in eyes; (fig.) thorn in one's flesh)
senses.label: 名詞

keywords: ngaan5 zung1 deng1 juk6 zung1 ci3
ngaan zung deng juk zung ci

senses.definition: 同#牙罅 （量詞:條） (gap between teeth)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 非常憤怒 (enraged; infuriated)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.translation: He left in a fit of rage.

senses.definition: 將細小嘅嘢再磨碎 (to grind)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢隻藥丸要磨碎先食得。
examples.translation: This pill has to be ground before taken.

senses.definition: 人嘅面貌 (face; countenance)
senses.label: 語素

examples.translation: face; appearance

senses.definition: 簡易嘅長度量度單位；將隻手打開到最盡，盡量分開手指公同尾指；喺呢個狀態之下，尾指最尖同手指公最尖嘅距離就係一揇 (measurement of length; open your hands until the distance between your thumb and little finger is maximized, that distance is called one naam)
senses.label: 量詞

senses.definition: 極差嘅運氣，指不幸嘅遭遇 (terrible fortune; calamity)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢個民族承受咗一個世紀嘅噩運。
examples.translation: This nation has suffered a calamity that has lasted for a century.

senses.definition: 令人哋理解唔到或者解釋一啲嘢 (to baffle; to daunt; to confound)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: I would not be baffled by this question.

senses.definition: 沾滿泥沙嘅汽車 (dirty and muddy car)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 細路仔未識得溝通果陣發出嘅聲音 (infant's talk)
senses.label: 名詞
